means: 艾柯病毒，人肠道孤病毒，人肠细胞病变孤儿病毒

word_mean: 埃可病毒，ECHO病毒，人肠道孤病毒：肠病毒的一种，已分离到31个血清型(1－9，11－18，20－27，29－34
28种已重新分类)，对人类有致病性，主要为无菌性脑膜炎。

sentence.Network_en: Hepatitis E virus ( HEV ) strain 87 A and enterovirus ( ETV ) echovirus type 13 were inocu - lated onto A 549 cell line.
sentence.Network_cn: 建立了生物素标记探针技术,以便用于戊型肝炎病毒 ( hepatitisEvirus,HEV ) 的诊断及与肠道病毒的鉴别.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 研究指出,处理肠道病毒特别困难,这种病毒抵抗灭活的能力比大肠杆菌大,经消毒处理的再生水中仍然存在着一些游离的传染性肠道病毒,如艾柯病毒(Echovirus)、脊髓灰质炎.
echovirus 人肠道孤病毒, echovirus 埃柯病毒, echovirus 仿病毒
新生儿肠道病毒感染包括柯萨奇病毒(Coxsackievirus,COX)、埃可病毒(ECHOvirus)、脊髓灰质炎病毒(poliovims)等,其中以柯萨奇病毒感染多见。
echotexture 回声, echovirus 人肠道孤病毒, echotime 回波时间

list.abs: 柯萨奇病毒B组(Coxasckievirus B CVB的1、2、 3、4、5 型等; 肠道病毒71型(Human Enterovirus 71 EV71); 埃可病毒(Echovirus ECHO)等其中以EV71及CVA16.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from echo (acronym from enteric cytopathogenic human orphan, because the virus was not originally assignable to any known disease) + virus

means.word_mean: 1. any of a group of viruses associated with various diseases including viral meningitis and mild respiratory disorders and diarrhea in newborn infants

auth_sentence.content: Echovirus 7 is normally linked with meningitis or encephalitis.
auth_sentence.res_content: Echovirus 7 is normally linked with meningitis or encephalitis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Echovirus 7 is normally linked with meningitis or encephalitis.

auth_sentence.content: The virus, similar to a common virus called echovirus 7, was found in only one of 29 people who had died from other causes.
auth_sentence.res_content: The virus, similar to a common virus called echovirus 7, was found in only one of 29 people who had died from other causes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The virus, similar to a common virus called echovirus 7, was found in only one of 29 people who had died from other causes.
